update t_acc_diskspace

mapper.select:
select
from t_acc_diskspace
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
-- and modify_date >= #{beginDate} and modify_date <= endDate and DATE(modify_date) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE(modify_date) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by modify_date DESC
